Content: Police ships are drawn from a number of blueprints. These blueprints
have certain ratios. These rations should be collected in templates, so
there can be ''core'' and ''rim'' templates. The value of each police
point is determined by the values of the the blueprints in the

templates, taking into account their buidlign costs and values.
To
determine the final value of each police point the relevant values
(speed, sensors, weaponisation, boarding, shields etc.) should be
sorted and the lowest X% ignored, to simulate specialized deployment.
